nvm Road Map

This is a list of the primary features planned for nvm:

  • [x] Rewriting installation code paths to support installing io.js and node v4+ from source.
    • This will include reusing previously downloaded tarballs that match checksums, which is a nice performance and bandwidth bonus.
  • [ ] Adding opt-in environment variable support to list, download, and install node release candidates, and nightly builds.
  • [ ] nvm update: the ability to autoupdate nvm itself
  • [ ] v1.0.0, including updating the nvm on npm to auto-install nvm properly
